title: mannan kaNNan
sahitya:
mannan kaNNan maNivaNNan gOpiyar manam nirai mAdhavan mAlavan yAdava


anupallavi

  En dishai niraindidum ezhil azhagan kuzhal paNNisai mayakkiDum pAr muzhuvadum gOkula


caraNam    kAmanai vaDittadum avanallavO tAi mAmanai muDittadum ivanallavO
shishupAlanai vIzhttiyadum avanallavO sudAmanai vAzhttiyadum ivanallavO brndAvana
